resources.string:
Hello there! this is Rumypet

If you have a abandoned dog and don't know whose dog it is, we have a perfect tool to find the owner.

You will going to record video for 5 seconds of the dog's nose. Please set your dog's nose in the middle, if the video is good, we will suggest the candidate of the dog.

But we recommend you to upload image from taken dog's nose image.

Will you try?"

No Dog Registered

Please click (+) Button
to register your dog.
